subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy coasted to the Giro d’Italia title on the final day, and Mark Cavendish won the 21st leg in a sprint finish for his fifth victory in this year’s race.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy coasted to the Giro d’Italia title on the final day, and Mark Cavendish won the 21st leg in a sprint finish for his fifth victory in this year’s race.
